trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Malibu
There were no other sightings in Malibu on or around March 11th 2012
Summary: Two very bright lights above night sky happening now!!! -One is brighter than the other!
divs: sighting detailswent outside to smoke a cigarette and notice something in the direction i always look at was off. yup, two! 2! t-w-o bright lights that appeared to be stars are right there!!! i have never seen them there before! trust me i always look up in that direction and these two-lights are way too bright to be stars!!!! i did\still am doing more observation and there appears to be very tiny satellites also appearing in the night sky way way above, where you can actually see the damn stars!!! these two lights are not stars go look for yourself!!! ...by the way opposite direction has a faint reddish ufo but im not too sure if its a ufo... are these the same ufos from the phoenix lights incident?!?!?!?
